properties.name: AssemblyFile
properties.help: The assembly with the benchmarks (required).

properties.name: Job
properties.help: Dry/Short/Medium/Long or Default

properties.name: Runtimes
properties.help: Full target framework moniker for .NET Core and .NET. For Mono just 'Mono', for CoreRT just 'CoreRT'. First one will be marked as baseline!

properties.name: Exporters
properties.help: GitHub/StackOverflow/RPlot/CSV/JSON/HTML/XML

properties.name: MemoryStats
properties.help: Prints memory statistics

properties.name: ThreadingStats
properties.help: Prints threading statistics

properties.name: Disassembly
properties.help: Gets disassembly of benchmarked code

properties.name: Profiler
properties.help: Profiles benchmarked code using selected profiler.

properties.name: Filter
properties.help: Glob patterns, e.g. <c>*</c>, <c>*.ClassA.*</c>, <c>*.ClassB.*</c>

properties.name: RunInProcess
properties.help: Run benchmarks in Process

properties.name: ArtifactsDirecory
properties.help: Valid path to accessible directory

properties.name: OutlierMode
properties.help: DontRemove/RemoveUpper/RemoveLower/RemoveAll

properties.name: Affinity
properties.help: Affinity mask to set for the benchmark process

properties.name: DisplayAllStatistics
properties.help: Displays all statistics (min, max & more)

properties.name: AllCategories
properties.help: Categories to run. If few are provided, only the benchmarks which belong to all of them are going to be executed

properties.name: AnyCategories
properties.help: Any Categories to run

properties.name: AttributeNames
properties.help: Run all methods with given attribute (applied to class or method)

properties.name: Join
properties.help: Prints single table with results for all benchmarks

properties.name: KeepBenchmarkFiles
properties.help: Determines if all auto-generated files should be kept or removed after running the benchmarks.

properties.name: DontOverwriteResults
properties.help: Determines if the exported result files should not be overwritten (by default they are overwritten).

properties.name: HardwareCounters
properties.help: Hardware Counters

properties.name: CliPath
properties.help: Path to dotnet CLI (optional).

properties.name: RestorePath
properties.help: The directory to restore packages to (optional).

properties.name: CoreRunPaths
properties.help: Path(s) to CoreRun (optional).

properties.name: MonoPath
properties.help: Optional path to Mono which should be used for running benchmarks.

properties.name: ClrVersion
properties.help: Optional version of private CLR build used as the value of <c>COMPLUS_Version</c> env var.

properties.name: CoreRtVersion
properties.help: Optional version of <c>Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler</c> which should be used to run with CoreRT. Example: <c>1.0.0-alpha-26414-01</c>

properties.name: CoreRtPath
properties.help: Optional IlcPath which should be used to run with private CoreRT build.

properties.name: LaunchCount
properties.help: How many times we should launch process with target benchmark. The default is <c>1</c>.

properties.name: WarmupCount
properties.help: How many warmup iterations should be performed. If you set it, the <c>minWarmupCount</c> and <c>maxWarmupCount</c> are ignored. By default calculated by the heuristic.

properties.name: MinWarmupCount
properties.help: Minimum count of warmup iterations that should be performed. The default is <c>6</c>.

properties.name: MaxWarmupCount
properties.help: Maximum count of warmup iterations that should be performed. The default is <c>50</c>.

properties.name: IterationTime
properties.help: Desired time of execution of an iteration in milliseconds. Used by Pilot stage to estimate the number of invocations per iteration. The default is <c>500</c> milliseconds.

properties.name: IterationCount
properties.help: How many target iterations should be performed. By default calculated by the heuristic.

properties.name: MinIterationCount
properties.help: Minimum number of iterations to run. The default is <c>15</c>.

properties.name: MaxIterationCount
properties.help: Maximum number of iterations to run. The default is <c>100</c>.

properties.name: InvocationCount
properties.help: Invocation count in a single iteration. By default calculated by the heuristic.

properties.name: UnrollFactor
properties.help: How many times the benchmark method will be invoked per one iteration of a generated loop. The default is <c>16</c>.

properties.name: RunStrategy
properties.help: The run strategy that should be used. Throughput/ColdStart/Monitoring.

properties.name: RunOncePerIteration
properties.help: Run the benchmark exactly once per iteration.

properties.name: PrintInformation
properties.help: Print environment information.

properties.name: ListBenchmarkCaseMode
properties.help: Prints all of the available benchmark names. Flat/Tree

properties.name: DisassemblyRecursiveDepth
properties.help: Sets the recursive depth for the disassembler.

properties.name: DisassemblyDiff
properties.help: Generates diff reports for the disassembler.

properties.name: BuildTimeout
properties.help: Build timeout in seconds.

properties.name: StopOnFirstError
properties.help: Stop on first error.

properties.name: StatisticalTestThreshold
properties.help: Threshold for Mannâ€“Whitney U Test. Examples: <c>5%</c>, <c>10ms</c>, <c>100ns</c>, <c>1s</c>

properties.name: DisableLogFile
properties.help: Disables the logfile.

properties.name: MaxParameterColumnWidth
properties.help: Max paramter column width, the default is <c>20</c>.
